issue.message: When targeting Android 13 or higher, posting a permission requires holding the `POST_NOTIFICATIONS` permission (usage from com.baseflow.geolocator.location.BackgroundNotification)
A newer version of com.android.tools.build:gradle than 8.1.0 is available: 8.10.0. (There is also a newer version of 8.1.𝑥 available, if upgrading to 8.10.0 is difficult: 8.1.4)
A newer version of com.android.tools:desugar_jdk_libs than 2.0.4 is available: 2.1.5
This folder configuration (`v21`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 21. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable`.
